property.name: mediacaption
property.value: U.S. Army photo by Sgt. Jesse Houk

note.text: Culture shock is a sense of confusion and uncertainty that comes when operating within a different culture. These feelings are often coupled with more difficult emotions, such as anxiety and fear. Everyone experiences culture shock when introduced to a new culture, but the degree to which one experiences it will vary based on personality, personal experiences, and preparation. Culture shock can often leave a negative impact on individuals. This impact often takes the form of disorientation, frustration, and depression.
